name: @monstermakes/larry-infrastructure
description: Larry infrastructure tools, utilities, and other helper functions.

scripts.start: echo '=> This is a library project and therefore has no server component. Exiting...' && exit 0
scripts.test: echo '=> Verifying...' && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test-unit-coverage
scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning built assets...' && rm -rf .nyc_output coverage
scripts.test-unit: echo '=> Running Tests...' && mocha -u tdd --timeout 60000 --colors test/unit/**/*.spec.js
scripts.watch-test-unit: echo '=> Running Test Watcher...' && mocha --watch test/unit/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-unit-coverage: echo '=> Running Tests w/ Coverage...' && nyc npm run test-unit && nyc --reporter=html report && nyc --lines 60 --functions 62 --branches 33 --per-file check-coverage
